London and Southern Counties (Championship Section) 1 Test Piece Contest London and Southern Counties Area london-and-southern-counties-championship-section National Championship of Great Britain (Championship Section Final) None London and Southern Counties
Championship
Pageantry
Arts & Leisure Centre (Gordon Craig Theatre), Stevenage, Hertfordshire, England, UK Best Cornet: Richard Straker, Friary Guildford Best Trombones: Friary Guildford (Merin Rhyd, Ian Stewart, Adam Gregory) Best Horn: Tim de Maeseneer, Medway Best Euphonium: Sam Wyne, Wantage.
